content.text:
# 1990 Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation

The 1990 Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation () was held in January 1991. It is part of the Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation series held in Hong Kong.
Top 10 song awards
The top 10 songs (十大勁歌金曲) of 1990 are as follows.

Additional awards
{|class="wikitable"
! Award
! Song name(if available for award)
! Recipient(s)
|-
| colspan=3 | The Most Popular Mandarin Song Award (最受歡迎國語歌曲獎)
|-
| style="background:#FFCC00; color:black" align=right | Gold award
|
| Jeremy Chang (張洪量)
|-
| style="background:#C0C0C0; color:black" align=right | Silver award
|
| Angus Tung
|-
| style="background:#CD7F32; color:black" align=right | Bronze award
|
| Sky Wu (伍思凱)
|-
| The Best Composition Award(最佳作曲獎)
|
|
* Music composers: Joseph Koo, Wong Jim
* Performed by: Sally Yeh
|-
| The Best Lyric Award(最佳填詞獎)
|
|
* Lyrics by: Wong Ka Kui
* Performed by: Beyond (Band members: Wong Ka Kui, Wong Ka Keung, Paul Wong Koon Chung, Yip Sai Wing)
|-
| The Best Music Arrangement Award(最佳編曲獎)
|
|
* Music Arrangement by: Joseph Koo
* Performed by Sally Yeh
|-
| The Best Song Producer Award(最佳歌曲監製獎)
|
|
* Music producer: Wong Jim
* Performed by: Sally Yeh
|-
| colspan=3 | The Most Popular New Artist Award (最受歡迎新人獎)
|-
| style="background:#FFCC00; color:black" align=right | Gold award
|
| Leon Lai
|-
| style="background:#C0C0C0; color:black" align=right | Silver award
|
| Tsang Hong Sang (曾航生)
|-
| style="background:#CD7F32; color:black" align=right | Bronze award
|
| May Ng (吳婉芳)
|-
| The Best Music Video Award(最佳音樂錄影帶獎)
|
|
* Director: Yeung wai-yip (楊偉業)
* Performed by: Tai Chi (太極)(Band members: Albert Lui, Patrick Lui, Joey Tang,Ernest Lau, Edde Sing, Ricky Chu, Gary Tong)
|-
| rowspan=2 | The Best Music Video Performance Award(最佳音樂錄影帶演出獎)
|
| Norman Cheung (張立基)
|-
|
| Grasshopper(Band members: Calvin Choy, Remus Choy, Edmond So)
|-
| The Most Popular Male Artist Award(最受歡迎男歌星獎)
|
| Andy Lau
|-
| The Most Popular Female Artist Award(最受歡迎女歌星獎)
|
| Sally Yeh
|-
| Gold Song Gold Award(金曲金獎)
|
| Sally Yeh
